topics.title: Housing squeeze & rents
topics.description: Record-low vacancy rates in Zürich; new ideas like giving priority to Swiss/long-term residents are stirring backlash vs. fair-housing concerns.

candidates.name: Lina Meier
candidates.character: Progressive (left-leaning). Prioritises a stronger social safety net and public services; backs premium relief in LAMal and more cost controls; pro–cooperative/affordable housing; supports closer EU ties incl. a framework agreement; ambitious climate policy (net-zero 2050, public transport, renewables); liberal on migration/asylum with focus on integration; progressive taxation and childcare support; values direct democracy with citizen initiatives to expand social programs. Determined to win a governing mandate by mobilising the urban base while reassuring centrist swing voters with pragmatic, costed plans.

initial_policy_positions.topic_1: The housing squeeze is a major concern. We need to boost the supply of affordable housing, including cooperative and social housing, and introduce stricter rent controls to protect tenants. We must reject policies that prioritize certain residents over others, ensuring fair access for everyone while focusing on building more homes.

candidates.name: Markus Keller
candidates.character: Conservative (right-leaning). Emphasises free markets and limited government; prefers competition and efficiency in healthcare (managed care, higher deductibles choice) over new subsidies; pro-property rights and deregulation to spur private housing supply; EU-sceptical—prefers bilateral deals without automatic legal alignment; energy security via technology neutrality incl. new-gen nuclear; strict migration controls with faster procedures; supports tax relief and individual taxation; prioritises neutrality, security, and fiscal discipline. Focused on winning a centre-right mandate by uniting conservatives and persuading cost-conscious moderates with a stability-and-competence message.

initial_policy_positions.topic_1: The housing squeeze in Zürich demands a market-based solution. We must ease restrictions on construction and promote private-sector development to increase supply. While I understand the concerns, prioritising residents based on origin goes against principles of fairness and free-market access.

demographics.name: Lisa Bonvin
demographics.demeanour: Meticulous and patient-focused, with a calm, professional manner.
demographics.backstory: Born 1983 in French-speaking Switzerland; MPharm from University of Geneva 2007. Joined her current hospital in 2010, specializing in oncology pharmacy and recently led a project to optimize chemotherapy drug dispensing.

demographics.name: Donika Krasniqi
demographics.demeanour: Compassionate and composed, providing comfort and structure during difficult times.
demographics.backstory: Born 1966 in Kosovo, she immigrated to Switzerland in the 1990s. After earning her federal diploma in 2005, she established her own funeral home, which she has managed for over 15 years.

demographics.name: Gionata Bruno
demographics.demeanour: Cultured and observant, with a passion for contemporary Ticinese art.
demographics.backstory: Born 1959 in Ticino; studied art history briefly before starting work in galleries in the late 1970s. Has managed Galleria Bianchi since 1995, curating over 100 exhibitions and fostering the careers of emerging local artists.

demographics.name: Alice Batista
demographics.demeanour: Methodical and principled, with extensive experience in corporate law.
demographics.backstory: Born 1964. She completed her law degree in 1988 and has practiced corporate law in Thurgau for over 30 years, specializing in complex contract negotiations for multinational clients.

demographics.name: Manola Grau-Gimenez
demographics.demeanour: Creative and enthusiastic, eager to learn practical design skills.
demographics.backstory: Born 2006. She began her CFC apprenticeship in interior design directly after compulsory schooling in 2022 and is currently in her second year, developing skills in CAD software.

demographics.name: Heidi Gnatz-Holsten
demographics.demeanour: Practical and resilient, with a deep understanding of aquaculture systems.
demographics.backstory: Born 1989 in Germany; BSc in Aquaculture 2011. Moved to Ticino for a technician role in 2012 and was promoted to farm manager in 2020, where she improved feed efficiency by 15%.

demographics.name: Quan Fei
demographics.demeanour: Precise and empathetic, skilled in operating complex medical equipment.
demographics.backstory: Born 1996 in China; moved to Switzerland for his studies, earning his BSc in Radiography in 2020. Has worked at the Kantonsspital Aarau since graduating, contributing to the implementation of a new radiotherapy planning system.

demographics.name: Jawad Al-Ali
demographics.demeanour: Organized and resourceful, skilled in managing large-scale building operations.
demographics.backstory: Born 1982 in Syria; arrived in Switzerland as a refugee in 2013 with an engineering background. Completed his Swiss federal diploma in facility management in 2019 and now oversees operations for several key corporate accounts in Geneva.

demographics.name: Alain Hauser
demographics.demeanour: Experienced and decisive, with a reputation for delivering complex projects on time.
demographics.backstory: Born 1958; earned a Master's in Civil Engineering from ETH Zurich in 1982. After working for a large firm, he founded his own contracting business in Bellinzona in 1995, specializing in public infrastructure projects.

demographics.name: Daniela Käser
demographics.demeanour: Assertive and highly organized, thriving in fast-paced live broadcast environments.
demographics.backstory: Born 1995; completed a media apprenticeship and worked up from production assistant starting in 2015. Became a floor manager in 2021, responsible for coordinating live news and talk show broadcasts for a major Swiss channel.

demographics.name: Georgette Comte-Bahon
demographics.demeanour: Polished and relational, drawing on a long career in client management.
demographics.backstory: Born 1957 in the canton of Vaud; built a 40-year career in sales and account management for a major consumer goods company. Retired in 2022 after managing the company's largest retail accounts for over a decade.

demographics.name: Irene Hotz
demographics.demeanour: Sharp and experienced, now semi-retired but active in legal consulting.
demographics.backstory: Born 1947. Admitted to the bar in 1972, she was a partner at her firm for over 30 years, specializing in inheritance law before transitioning to a senior counsel role in 2015.

demographics.name: Büşranur Alemdar
demographics.demeanour: Detail-oriented and highly ethical, with extensive knowledge of financial regulations.
demographics.backstory: Born 1960 in Turkey. She became a Swiss Certified Accountant in 1990 and has been a senior partner at her firm for 20 years, specializing in corporate audits for listed companies.

demographics.name: Raquel Neves
demographics.demeanour: Technically proficient and reliable, with a good eye for color and quality.
demographics.backstory: Born 1991. She completed her CFC apprenticeship in print media operation in 2011 and has worked for a major commercial printer for 13 years, now leading a team on the digital press line.

demographics.name: Patricia Bonnet
demographics.demeanour: Creative and patient, with a tactile understanding of materials and form.
demographics.backstory: Born 1959 in France, she moved to Ticino in the 1980s to establish her pottery studio in Ascona. Over 40 years, her work has been featured in several national exhibitions and she actively teaches ceramics workshops.

demographics.name: Donatella Kohler
demographics.demeanour: Empathetic and focused, with a motivational communication style.
demographics.backstory: Born 2000; completed MSc in Psychology in 2024, specializing in athlete mental resilience. Joined Seiler & Cie. in Freiburg, focusing on performance anxiety for young athletes.

demographics.name: Christophe Reynaud-Laroche
demographics.demeanour: Practical and hardworking, with a deep respect for land management.
demographics.backstory: Born 1993; earned his Agricultural Practitioner AFP certificate around 2011. Has worked for Chevalley Badel SA for over a decade, specializing in dairy herd management.

demographics.name: Albert Masseron
demographics.demeanour: Methodical and detail-oriented with decades of claims assessment experience.
demographics.backstory: Born 1958; began his career in the late 1970s after trade school. As a senior chartered loss adjuster, he has assessed over 3,000 complex property claims and is approaching retirement.

demographics.name: Beate Hafner
demographics.demeanour: Analytically sharp and passionate about labor rights advocacy.
demographics.backstory: Born 2001; graduated with a BA in Sociology in 2023, focusing her thesis on wage inequality. Joined the trade union as a junior research officer, analyzing collective bargaining agreements.

demographics.name: Nicholas Hofstetter-Haas
demographics.demeanour: Organized and client-focused, adept at managing complex travel logistics.
demographics.backstory: Born 1994; earned his Federal Diploma in Tourism Management around 2016. Has managed international group tours for Godet for the past 8 years, focusing on the Asian market.

demographics.name: Charles Julliard
demographics.demeanour: Patient and observant, skilled in diagnosing learning challenges in children.
demographics.backstory: Born 1988; obtained his MSc in Educational Psychology around 2012. He has since worked with primary schools in Ticino, assessing over 500 students for learning disabilities.

demographics.name: Guillaume Rey
demographics.demeanour: Eager to learn and meticulous, with a growing proficiency in CAD software.
demographics.backstory: Born 2007; began his four-year apprenticeship in mechanical drafting at Steffen Bieri AG after compulsory schooling in 2023. He is currently in his second year, focusing on component design.

demographics.name: Linda Bellini
demographics.demeanour: Systematic and security-conscious, excellent at coordinating technical teams.
demographics.backstory: Born 1998; completed her federal diploma in security systems around 2022. As a project manager at Besançon SA, she oversaw the installation of new surveillance systems for three corporate clients in 2024.

demographics.name: Elvira Pérez Arco
demographics.demeanour: Gregarious and sharp-witted, with a lifetime of business acumen.
demographics.backstory: Born 1945 in Spain; immigrated to Switzerland in the 1960s and began working in IT in the 1980s. She retired in 2010 after a 25-year career, having managed a top-performing sales team for over a decade.

demographics.name: Gianluca Carli
demographics.demeanour: Observant and methodical, with a keen eye for potential liabilities.
demographics.backstory: Born 1998; after completing higher commercial studies around 2018, he joined Schär & Co. as a trainee. He has been a qualified risk surveyor for 5 years, specializing in commercial liability for SMEs.

demographics.name: Sylvie Isella
demographics.demeanour: Reliable and resourceful, skilled in practical problem-solving.
demographics.backstory: Born 1999; earned her AFP certificate in facility maintenance in 2017. She has worked for Rey for 7 years, responsible for the upkeep of three commercial properties.

demographics.name: Gazmend Krasniqi
demographics.demeanour: Intensely focused and analytical, driven by scientific inquiry.
demographics.backstory: Born 1990; completed his PhD in Geochemistry from ETH Zurich in 2018, focusing on groundwater contaminants. He joined Hanson-Sanders as a research scientist, where his work contributed to two peer-reviewed papers in 2023.

demographics.name: Emmanuel Chevalier
demographics.demeanour: Creative and resourceful, adept at transforming concepts into physical spaces.
demographics.backstory: Born 2000; graduated with a BA in Theatre Design from ZHdK in 2022. He has since worked on five productions for Scheidegger Stocker AG, including a notable stage design for a 2024 regional tour.

demographics.name: Renato Furlan
demographics.demeanour: Patient and resilient, with an encyclopedic knowledge of local waterways.
demographics.backstory: Born 2002; completed his federal diploma for professional fishing in 2021 after his apprenticeship. He now co-operates a vessel on Lake Neuchâtel, contributing to a seasonal catch of over 10 tonnes.

demographics.name: Francisca Vieira
demographics.demeanour: Discreet and highly organized, managing patient data with precision.
demographics.backstory: Born 1993; after completing commercial school around 2012, she specialized in medical administration. For the past 8 years, she has managed the patient records and appointments for a busy specialist clinic.

demographics.name: Odette Diesbach
demographics.demeanour: Extroverted and pragmatic, with an analytical approach to sustainable farming.
demographics.backstory: Born 1990. Earned an MSc in Agricultural Science (2015), then joined Schwab Gerber AG in 2016, specializing in dairy farm optimization and improving client milk yields by an average of 12%.

demographics.name: Savannah Garcia
demographics.demeanour: Energetic and hands-on, eager to learn practical construction skills.
demographics.backstory: Born 2006. Began a polybuilder apprenticeship in 2022 after completing compulsory school. She is currently in her second year of vocational training with Monnard, focusing on waterproofing systems.

demographics.name: Jin Wei
demographics.demeanour: Meticulous and detail-oriented with deep technical knowledge of building codes.
demographics.backstory: Born 1988 in Shanghai; moved to Switzerland for postgraduate studies. He earned an MSc in Civil Engineering from EPFL in 2013 and has worked as a surveyor in Ticino since 2015.

demographics.name: Sevican Asu Yorulmaz
demographics.demeanour: Energetic and customer-focused, with a natural talent for team motivation.
demographics.backstory: Born 2004 in Romanshorn. Joined Schwarz AG as a sales assistant after finishing school in 2021 and was promoted to shift supervisor within two years due to strong performance.

demographics.name: Olivier Galland
demographics.demeanour: Experienced and authoritative, with exacting standards for quality and craftsmanship.

demographics.name: Bahittin Hicsonmez Akdeniz
demographics.demeanour: Analytical and articulate, navigating a recent career transition with determination.
demographics.backstory: Born 1989 in Turkey, earning a law degree there before immigrating to Switzerland. After having his qualifications recognized, he began working as a junior legal consultant in 2022.

demographics.name: Manuel Zoppetti-Brenna

demographics.demeanour: Resilient and practical, with extensive knowledge of sustainable forest management.

demographics.name: Pauline Masson-Gomez

demographics.backstory: Born 2004 in Geneva canton; completed compulsory schooling in 2020. Currently in the third year of his electrician apprenticeship based in Bernex.

demographics.job: Monteur de faux plafonds avec brevet fédéral

demographics.backstory: Born 1959; gained his federal diploma in ceiling installation in his early twenties. He has worked as a specialist contractor in the Vaud canton for over 35 years.
